“Mej yuav pum ‘Yaam kws phem kawg nkaus’ nyob huv qhov chaw kws tsi tsimnyog yaam ntawd nyob.” (Tug kws nyeem zaaj nuav, ca le totaub!) “Thaus ntawd cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub xeev Yudas ca le tsiv moog rua peg tej roob.
Tug kws nyob nrau zoov tsi xob rov moog nqaa ib yaam dlaabtsi huv tsev.
Tug kws nyob tom teb, tsi xob rov lug nqaa nwg lub tsho ntev.
Lub sijhawm ntawd tej quaspuj kws suab mivnyuas hab tej quaspuj kws muaj mivnyuas mog noj mig yuav txomnyem kawg le.
Mej yuavtsum thov Vaajtswv paab kuas mej tsi xob tau tsiv lub caij ntuj no!
Txij thaus Vaajtswv tsim lub nplajteb lug txug naj nub nua, tsi muaj kev txomnyem heev npaum le zag nuav, hab yaav tom ntej yuav tsi muaj le zag nuav lawm.

Tabsis tug Tswv tub txav nub txav nyoog kuas tuab lu lawm. Yog nwg tsi ua le ntawd, yeej yuav tsi muaj leejtwg dlim le. Qhov kws Vaajtswv txav nub txav nyoog kuas tuab lu ntawd, tub yog vim nwg hlub nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws nwg tau xaiv ca lawm.
“Thaus ntawd, yog leejtwg has rua mej has tas, ‘Mej saib, tug Mexiyas nyob ntawm nuav!’ Lossis has tas, ‘Nwg nyob tod!’ Mej tsi xob ntseeg tug ntawd tej lug.
Rua qhov yuav muaj tej Mexiyas cuav hab tej cevlug cuav lug ua tej txujci tseemceeb ntxag Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg saib puas yuav ntxag tau kuas puab yuam kev.
Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj, rua qhov kuv tub qha tej nuav rua mej paub ua ntej lawm.
“Thaus tej kev txomnyem ntawd dlhau lawm, lub nub yuav tsaus, lub hli yuav tsi ci,
tej nubqub sau ntuj yuav poob lug, hab txhua yaam kws muaj fwjchim nyob sau nruab ntug yuav ua zug koog huv tuabsi.
Thaus ntawd suavdlawg yuav pum Tuabneeg leej Tub tshwm sau cov fuab lug, nwg lub fwjchim hab tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab.
Nwg yuav khaiv nwg cov timtswv moog txhua nrho plaub ceg kaum ntuj, hu cov tuabneeg kws Vaajtswv tub xaiv ca lawm, saab ntuj tim nuav moog txug saab ntuj tim u, lug nyob ua ke.
“Mej saib tsob txiv ncuav pas qha le caag. Thaus nwg tej ceg rov ntsuab hab pib hlaav nplooj mog nyoos, ces mej paub has tas, tub yuav txug lub caij ntuj naag.
Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd, thaus mej pum tej ntawd, mej yuav paub has tas, nwg tub lug ze lawm.
Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, thaus cov tuabneeg tam nuav tseem tuag tsi tau taag, tub xub muaj tej ntawd lawm.
Lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb yuav pluj moog, tabsis kuv tej lug yuav tsi muaj ib lus poob le.
“Tabsis nub ntawd hab lub sijhawm ntawd, tsi muaj leejtwg paub. Txawm yog cov timtswv ceebtsheej lossis Tuabneeg leej Tub los yeej tsi paub; tsuas yog leej Txiv tuab leeg txhaj paub xwb.
Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj hab zuv tog, rua qhov mej tsi paub has tas, thaus twg yuav txug lub sijhawm ntawd.

Lub sijhawm ntawd zoo ib yaam le ib tug txivneej kws tawm huv nwg lub tsev moog rua lwm qhov, tseg nwg cov tubkhai zuv tsev hab faib num rua puab, nyag muaj nyag ib teg num. Hab nwg has kuas tug zuv qhovrooj, zuv zoo zoo.

Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum zuv zoo zoo, rua qhov mej tsi paub has tas thaus twg mej tug Tswv yuav rov lug. Tej zag nwg yuav lug thaus tsaus ntuj lossis thaus ib taag mo lossis thaus qab qua lossis thaus kaaj ntug.
Nyob tsaam nwg lug taamsim, hab pum mej tseem pw tsaug zug.
Tej lug kws kuv qha rua mej, kuv has rua suavdlawg ib yaam nkaus tas, mej yuavtsum zuv Tog!”

Tshuav ob nub xwb txug nub ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau hab ua Kevcai Noj Ncuav Tsi Xyaw Keeb. Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai taabtom nrhav kev nteg Yexus tuabywv coj moog tua povtseg.
Puab has tas, “Peb tsi xob rawm ua le ntawd thaus suavdlawg tseem taabtom ua kevcai, nyob tsaam ua rua suavdlawg ntxhuv.”

Tom qaab ntawd Yexus su huv Ximoos tug kws thaus mob ruas ib zag lawm lub tsev tom lub zog Npethanis. Thaus Yexus taabtom noj mov, muaj ib tug quaspuj nqaa ib fwj roj tsw qaab kim heev kws muab nroj naludas ua tuaj. Nwg muab lub ncauj fwj luv, hab muab cov roj tsw qaab ntawd laub rua Yexus taubhau.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd muaj qee leej tsi txaus sab, hab has tas, “Ua le caag nwg yuav muab cov roj tsw qaab ntawd nkim povtseg?
Yog muab coj moog muag, yuav tau ntau dlua peb puas lub nyaj,  hab muab cov nyaj ntawd moog pub rua cov tuabneeg pluag kuj zoo dlua!” Hab puab thuam tug quaspuj ntawd heev.
Tabsis Yexus has rua puab tas, “Ca nwg ua nwg! Tsi xob ua rua nwg nyuaj sab! Qhov kws nwg ua rua kuv ntawd yog ib qhov zoo.
Yeej yuav muaj cov tuabneeg pluag nrug mej nyob moog le, mej xaav paab puab thaus twg los yeej tau, tabsis kuv yuav tsi nrug mej nyob moog ib simneej.
Tug quaspuj nuav yeej ua lawv le nwg ua tau. Nwg muab roj tsw qaab laub rua kuv lub cev, tub yog nwg tu kuv lub cev tseg rua nub kws log kuv.

Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, qhov kws tug quaspuj nuav ua yuav nrov nchaa moog rua txhua qhov huv qaab ntuj kws muaj tuabneeg moog qha Txujmoo Zoo, kuas suavdlawg ncu txug tej kws tug quaspuj nuav tau ua lawm.”
Tom qaab ntawd Yexus kaum ob tug thwjtim tug kws hu ua Yudas Ixakali-us txawm moog cuag cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, nwg ntxeev sab muab Yexus muag rua puab.
Thaus puab nov Yudas has le ntawd, puab zoo sab kawg le, puab coglug has tas puab yuav muab nyaj rua Yudas. Yog le ntawd, Yudas txawm nrhav sijhawm muab Yexus rua puab.

Thawj nub kws ua Kevcai Noj Ncuav Tsi Xyaw Keeb, nub ntawd yog nub kws suavdlawg tua mivnyuas yaaj noj ua Kevcai Hlaa dlhau. Yexus cov thwjtim nug Yexus has tas, “Koj xaav kuas peb moog npaaj pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua koj noj qhov twg?”
Yexus txawm khaiv nwg ob tug thwjtim moog hab qha obtug has tas, “Meb ca le moog huv lub nroog, yuav muaj ib tug txivneej kwv ib hub dlej lug ntsib meb. Meb ca le lawv nwg qaab moog
rua huv tsev, hab meb has rua tug tswv tsev tas, ‘Xwbfwb has tas koj yuav muab chaav twg rua kuv hab kuv cov thwjtim noj pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau?’
Tug tswv tsev ntawd yuav coj meb nce moog rua txheej sau, hab nwg yuav qha ib chaav dlaav dlaav kws tub muaj rooj muaj tog txhij lawm rua meb. Meb ca le npaaj txhua yaam ca rua qhov ntawd tog peb.”
Ob tug thwjtim txawm moog huv lub nroog, hab pum txhua yaam lawv le Yexus qha rua obtug lawm, obtug txawm npaaj pluag mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua qhov ntawd.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, Yexus hab kaum ob tug thwjtim lug txug.

Thaus puab taabtom noj mov ntawm rooj, Yexus has tas, “Kuv qha tseeb rua mej has tas, mej cov kws nrug kuv noj mov ntawm nuav, muaj ib tug yuav ntxeev sab rua kuv, nwg yog tug kws nrug kuv noj ua ke.”
Thaus cov thwjtim nov Yexus has le ntawd, puab nyuaj sab, puab nug Yexus zum zawg has tas, “Koj has le ko puas yog kuv?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Mej kaum ob leeg nuav yog ib leeg ntaag, tug ntawd yog tug kws nrug kuv koom ntsw ib lub taig.

Tuabneeg leej Tub yeej yuav tuag lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug sau has txug nwg lawm, tabsis tug kws ntxeev sab rua Tuabneeg leej Tub, nwg yuav raug kev puamtsuaj! Yog nwg tsi xob yug lug kuj yuav zoo dlua!”

Thaus puab tseem taabtom noj mo, Yexus muab ib lub ncuav lug tuav ntawm teg. Nwg ua Vaajtswv tsaug hab muab lub ncuav ntawd ndlais cev rua nwg cov thwjtim hab has tas, “Lub ncuav nuav yog kuv lub cev, mej ca le txais moog noj.”
Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus muab ib khob cawv txiv maab lug hab ua Vaajtswv tsaug, nwg muab khov cawv ntawd cev rua puab, hab puab txhua tug txais haus.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Cov cawv txiv maab nuav yog kuv cov ntshaav kws ndlwg lug ntxuav ntau leej lub txim. Kuv cov ntshaav yog ua lub homthawj kws nas rua Vaajtswv txujlug cog tseg.
Kuv qha rua mej has tas, kuv yuav tsi haus cov cawv txiv maab nuav moog txug nub kws kuv haus cov cawv txiv maab tshab huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.”
Thaus puab hu ib zaaj nkauj taag, puab txawm tawm moog rua peg Roob Txiv Ntoo Roj lawm.

Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej txhua tug yuav tsiv huv tuabsi tso kuv tseg, rua qhov Vaajtswv txujlug sau tseg lawm has tas, ‘Vaajtswv yuav tua tug tswv yug yaaj, hab paab yaaj yuav tawg nyag tsiv nyag moog taag huv tuabsi.’
Tabsis thaus kuv sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug lawm, kuv yuav ua mej ntej moog rua peg Kalilais.”
Petus teb Yexus has tas, “Txawm yog suavdlawg tso koj tseg taag lawm los kuv yuav tsi tso koj tseg!”
Yexus has rua Petus has tas, “Kuv qha rua koj has tas, ‘Mo nuav thaus qab tsi tau qua ob tsig, koj yuav has peb zag has tas, koj tsi paub kuv.’ ”
Petus teb tawv qhawv has tas, “Txawm yog kuv yuav nrug koj tuag los kuv yuav tsi has tas, kuv tsi paub koj ib zag le!” Hab taagnrho cov thwjtim puavleej has ib yaam nkaus.
Yexus nrug nwg cov thwjtim moog rua ntawm qhov chaw kws hu ua Khexemanes. Nwg has rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej nyob ntawm nuav kuv yuav moog thov Vaajtswv tod.”
Yexus txawm coj Petus, Yakaunpaus, hab Yauhaas nrug nwg moog. Yexus nyuaj sab hab ntxhuv sab kawg le.
Nwg has rua puab tas, “Kuv nyuaj sab kawg le, tub yuav tuag, mej ca le nrug kuv nyob ntawm nuav tsi xob tsaug zug.”
Yexus moog tom ntej mivntsiv, ces nwg txawm txhus caug ndlua rua huv aav thov Vaajtswv has tas, yog tau, thov kuas nwg tsi xob raug txujkev txomnyem nuav.

Nwg thov ntxiv has tas, “Kuv Txiv, kuv Txiv! Koj ua tau ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi, thov koj muab lub khob nuav tshem ntawm kuv moog. Txawm le caag los thov koj tsi xob ua lawv le kuv lub sab nyam, tabsis ua lawv le koj lub sab nyam xwb.”

Thaus Yexus rov qaab lug rua ntawm nwg peb tug thwjtim, nwg pum puab tsaug zug taag lawm. Nwg has rua Petus has tas, “Ximoos, koj tsaug zug lawm los? Koj tub yoo tsi taug dlaab ndlub nrug kuv nyob ib txoog teev le los?”
Hab Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj hab thov Vaajtswv paab, kev sim sab txhaj yuav ntxag tsi tau mej. Lub sab mas kub quas lug, tabsis lub cev qaug zug heev.”
Yexus rov qaab moog thov Vaajtswv dlua ib zag, hab has ib yaam le qub.
Thaus nwg rov qaab lug, nwg pum cov thwjtim tsaug zug taag lawm; puab rua tsi taug qhovmuag le, hab puab tsi paub yuav has le caag rua nwg.

Thaus nwg rov qaab lug zag peb, nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej tseem yuav tsaug zug hab su kuas txaus tsaiv los? Tsaug zug le ko xwb txaus lawm! Tub txug lub sijhawm lawm! Mej saib, Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav raug luas nteg coj moog rua cov tuabneeg txhum txhais teg.
Mej ca le sawv peb moog. Mej saib, tug tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua kuv tub tuaj txug lawm!”

Thaus Yexus tseem taabtom has le ntawd, ces Yudas kws yog ib tug ntawm kaum ob tug thwjtim txawm tuaj txug. Muaj ib paab tuabneeg coob coob nqaa ntaaj nqaa qws nrug nwg tuaj. Paab ntawd yog cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai hab cov txwjlaug tso tuaj.
Tug kws ntxeev sab rua Yexus tub xub qha rua cov tuabneeg ntawd lawm has tas, “Kuv nwj tug twg, ces yog tug ntawd ntaag. Mej ca le nteg nwg hab coj nwg moog, mej saib zoo zoo tsi xob pub nwg tsiv.”
Thaus Yudas tuaj txug, nwg ncaaj nraim moog rua ntawm Yexus hab has tas, “Xwbfwb!” ces nwg txawm nwj kag Yexus.
Cov tuabneeg kws nrug Yudas tuaj txawm sau nthwv lug nteg Yexus hab tuav Yexus ruaj ruaj.
Ces cov tuabneeg kws sawv ze ntawd, muaj ib tug rhu hlo nwg raab ntaaj lug tuab ntaag rua tug Povthawj Hlub ib tug tubqhe saab nploojntseg xis tu nrho.
Yexus has rua puab tas, “Mej nqaa ntaaj nqaa qws tuaj nteg kuv ib yaam le kuv yog tubsaab los?
Kuv naj nub qha mej huv lub Tuamtsev, ua le caag mej tsua tsi nteg kuv? Tabsis yeej yuav muaj le nuav, txhaj tav lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug.”
Cov thwjtim txawm tsiv taag lawm tso Yexus tseg.
Muaj ib tug tub hluas lawv Yexus qaab, nwg tsi naav rig tsho, nwg npua ib dlaim ntaub maag xwb. Cov tuabneeg ntawd yuav nteg nwg hab,
tabsis nwg muab dlaim ntaub ntawd hle hlo tseg hab tsiv labqaab ploog lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd, puab coj Yexus moog rua tom tug Povthawj Hlub lub tsev, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj, hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai tub tuaj ua ke saablaaj qhov ntawd lawm.
Petus lawv Yexus qaab nrug dleb dleb, nwg moog txug ntawm lub tshaav puam ntawm tug Povthawj Hlub lub tsev. Nwg moog nrug cov tuabneeg kws zuv tug Povthawj Hlub lub tsev nte tawg.
Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj nrhav lug nkaug Yexus, kuas puab tau cai muab Yexus tua povtseg, tabsis puab nrhav tsi tau.
Muaj ntau leej tuaj ua timkhawv dlaag has tas, Yexus ua txhum, tabsis tej lug kws puab has tsi sis thooj.
Muaj qee leej sawv ua timkhawv nkaug Yexus has tas,
“Peb nov nwg has tas, ‘Kuv yuav muab lub Tuamtsev kws yog tuabneeg txhais teg ua nuav lauj povtseg. Hab tom qaab ntawd peb nub, kuv yuav ua tau ib lub tshab kws tsi yog tuabneeg txhais teg ua.’ ”
Txawm yog puab has ib zaaj xwb los puab tej lug tsi sis thooj.
Tug Povthawj Hlub txawm sawv tseeg nug Yexus has tas, “Puab nkaug koj le ntawd, koj tsi muaj lug teb puab le los?”
Tabsis Yexus ua tuabywv tsi teb ib lus le. Tug Povthawj Hlub rov nug Yexus has tas, “Koj puas yog tug Mexiyas kws yog Vaajtswv tug kws Dlawbhuv tug Tub?”
Yexus teb has tas, “Kuv yog! Hab mej yuav pum Tuabneeg leej Tub nyob ntawm Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus saab xis, hab nrug fuab nrug cua lug sau ntuj lug!”
Thaus tug Povthawj Hlub nov le ntawd, nwg txawm dlua rhe nwg lub tsho hab has tas, “Tsi taag peb yuav moog nrhav timkhawv ntxiv lawm!
Mej tub nov nwg tej lug thuam ntawd lawm. Mej yuav has le caag?” Puab suavdlawg teb has tas, “Nwg ua txhum lawm, tsimnyog muab nwg tua povtseg.”

Cov tuabneeg ntawd muaj qee leej ntu quavncaug rua Yexus, puab muab phuam paav Yexus qhovmuag hab ntaus Yexus. Puab has rua Yexus has tas, “Koj sim twv saib yog leejtwg ntaus koj?” Cov tubrog coj Yexus moog hab xuas tawg ncuav rua Yexus.
Petus tseem nyob ntawm tshaav puam, tug Povthawj Hlub ib tug ntxhais qhev tuaj
pum Petus nyob quastsawg nte tawg, nwg saib ntsoov Petus hab has tas, “Koj yog tug kws ibtxwm nrug Yexus tug kws yog tuabneeg Naxales hab los sav.”
Tabsis Petus tsi leeg le. Petus teb has tas, “Koj has le ko, sov yog koj has leejtwg, kuv tsi paub le…” Petus tawm moog txug ntawm roojvaag. Taamsim ntawm qab txawm qua.
Thaus tug ntxhais qhev pum Petus nyob ntawd, nwg txawm has rua cov tuabneeg kws sawv ntawd tas, “Tug nuav yog Yexus puab paab ib tug tag!”

Tabsis Petus tsi leeg dlua ib zag. Tom qaab ntawd mivntsiv, cov tuabneeg kws sawv ntawd has rua Petus has tas, “Koj tsi xob has tas, koj tsi yog puab paab ntawd ib tug, rua qhov peb tub paub has tas, koj yog tuabneeg Kalilais.”
Petus txawm twv has tas, “Yog kuv dlaag, thov Vaajtswv rau txim rua kuv. Kuv tsi paub tug txivneej kws mej has ntawd le.”

Taamsim ntawd qab txawm qua zag ob. Petus ncu dlheev txug tej lug kws Yexus has rua Petus has tas, “Thaus qab tsi tau qua ob tsig, koj yuav has peb zag has tas, koj tsi paub kuv.” Petus quaj tu sab kawg le.

Thaus kaaj ntug lawm, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj txawm moog nrug cov txwjlaug, cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai, hab cov numtswv saablaaj, saib puab yuav ua le caag rua Yexus. Puab muab Yexus khi coj moog rua Philaj.
Philaj nug Yexus has tas, “Koj yog cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv los?” Yexus teb has tas, “Yog le koj has.”
Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj has ntau zaaj nkaug Yexus,
Philaj rov nug Yexus has tas, “Koj tsi teb puab los? Koj tsi nov puab has ntau zaaj nkaug koj los?”
Tabsis Yexus tsi teb ib lus le hab, ua rua Philaj xaav tsi thoob le.
Lawv le ibtxwm, txhua zag kws ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau, Philaj yeej tso ib tug tuabneeg raug txim lawv le cov pejxeem thov. Puab thov tug twg, nwg tso tug ntawd.
Thaus ntawd muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Npalanpas, nwg raug kaw huv tsev lojcuj, vim nwg nrug cov tuabneeg ntxeev num ntxeev tswv kws tua tuabneeg.
Thaus cov tuabneeg coob coob ua ke tuaj thov Philaj tso ib tug tuabneeg rua puab lawv le nwg ibtxwm tso,
Philaj nug puab has tas, “Mej xaav kuas kuv tso cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv rua mej los?”
Philaj yeej paub tseeb has tas, cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj khib, puab txhaj nteg Yexus coj tuaj rua nwg.
Tabsis cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj ntxag kuas cov pejxeem thov Philaj tso Npalanpas lug rua puab.
Philaj rov nug cov pejxeem has tas, “Mej xaav kuas kuv ua le caag rua tug txivneej kws mej hu has tas, ‘Cov Yudais tug vaajntxwv?’ ”
Puab teb nrov nrov has tas, “Muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig!”
Philaj rov nug puab has tas, “Nwg ua txhum dlaabtsi?” Puab hajyam has nrov dlua qub has tas, “Muab nwg ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig.”
Philaj xaav ua kuas hum cov pejxeem suavdlawg sab, nwg txhaj tso Npalanpas rua puab. Tom qaab ntawd nwg kuas luas muab Yexus nplawm, hab coj Yexus moog ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig.
Cov tubrog txawm coj Yexus moog rua huv lub tshaav puam ntawm tug tswvxeev lub tsev, hab hu paab tubrog taagnrho tuaj ua ke.
Puab muab ib lub tsho ntev tsaamxem lab rua Yexus naav, hab muab maab xuavpaug ua kauj looj Yexus taubhau.
Puab ua txuj hawm nwg dlog dlig hab has tas, “Thov kuas cov Yudais tug Vaajntxwv muaj sa nyob ntev!”
Puab muab ib tug lojkov ntaus Yexus taubhau, ntu quavncaug rua Yexus, txhus caug hab ua txuj pe nwg.
Thaus puab ua saib tsi taug Yexus taag lawm, puab muab lub tsho ntev tsaamxem lab hle hab muab Yexus lub khu rua Yexus naav. Puab coj Yexus moog ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig.

Thaus puab taug kev moog, puab ntsib ib tug txivneej hu ua Ximoos, nwg tuaj peg yaajsaab tuaj, yuav moog rua huv lub nroog. Puab yuam nwg kwv Yexus tug ntoo khaublig. (Tug Ximoos nuav nyob huv lub nroog Kulenes, nwg ob tug tub yog Alexaades hab Lufus.)
Puab coj Yexus moog rua ntawm qhov chaw kws hu ua Khaulakhauthas, lub npe ntawd txhais has tas, “Pobtxhaa Taubhau.”
Thaus puab moog txug tod lawm, puab muab cawv txiv maab xyaw tshuaj tsw qaab maules cev rua Yexus haus, tabsis Yexus tsi kaam haus.
Thaus puab muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig lawm, puab muab Yexus cev rig tsho lug twv saib leejtwg yuav tau yaam twg.
Lub sijhawm kws puab muab Yexus ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig, yog thaus cuaj teev sawv ntxuv.
Puab sau ib nqais lug nkaug Yexus has tas, “Cov Yudais tug Vaajntxwv.”.
Puab muab ob tug tubsaab ntsa rua sau ob tug ntoo khaublig, muab ib tug txhus rua ntawm Yexus saab xis, hab muab ib tug txhus rua ntawm Yexus saab txhumphem. [
Tej nuav muaj tav lawv le Vaajtswv txujlug kws has tas, “Luas suav has tas nwg ua txhum ib yaam le cov tuabneeg ua txhum.”]
Cov tuabneeg kws dlhau txujkev ntawd, puab cu hau nto hab thuam has tas, “Koj has tas, koj yuav rhuav lub Tuamtsev, hab peb nub koj yuav rov ua tau ib lub tshab!
Koj ca le paab koj kuas dlim hab nqeg sau tug ntoo khaublig ko lug!”
Cov thawj ntawm cov povthawj hab cov xwbfwb kws qha Vaajtswv txuj Kevcai thuam Yexus ib yaam nkaus. Puab sis thaam has tas, “Nwg cawm tau lwm tug, tabsis nwg cawm tsi tau nwg!

Kuas tug Mexiyas kws yog cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv ca le nqeg kag sau tug ntoo khaublig lug rua peb saib, peb txhaj yuav ntseeg nwg!” Ob tug tubsaab kws raug ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig ib yaam le Yexus los kuj thuam Yexus hab.
Thaus nub ntseg txawm tsaus ntuj nti thoob plawg lub tebchaws, tsaus moog txug thaus peb teev nub qaij.
Thaus peb teev nub qaij, Yexus hu nrov nrov has tas, “Elau-is, Elau-is, lemas xanpathanis?” Lu lug ntawd txhais has tas, “Kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tug Vaajtswv, ua le caag koj muab kuv tso tseg lawm?”
Cov tuabneeg kws sawv ntawd muaj qee leej nov Yexus has le ntawd, puab has tas, “Mej noog saib, nwg hu Eliyas!”

Cov tuabneeg ntawd muaj ib tug txawm moog muab ib tug lojkov chob ib lub taub ntxuav yag raus cawv txiv maab qaub, cev moog rua ntawm Yexus qhovncauj hab has tas, “Peb tog mivntsiv saib, puas pum Eliyas lug paab nwg dlim ntawm tug ntoo khaublig!”
Yexus qw ib suab nrov nrov, ces nwg txawm tu sav nrho lawm.
Taamsim ntawd dlaim ntaub kws thaiv huv lub Tuamtsev txawm ndluag rhe sau ti nkaus rua huv taw ua ob dlaig.
Tug thawj tubrog kws sawv ze ntawm tug ntoo khaublig pum Yexus tuag le ntawd, Nwg has tas, “Tug nuav yog Vaajtswv tug Tub tag.”
Muaj ib cov quaspuj tuaj sawv dleb dleb saib. Cov quaspuj ntawd yog Malis Madalas, Malis tug kws yog Yakaunpaus hluas hab Yauxej nam, hab Xalaumes.
Cov quaspuj ntawd yog cov kws ibtxwm paab Yexus, hab nrug Yexus tuaj peg Kalilais tuaj, hab muaj dlua ib cov quaspuj kws nrug Yexus tuaj rua huv Yeluxalees los nyob ntawd hab.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj kws yog nub npaaj qhov txhua chaw ca rua nub Xanpataus, Yauxej kws nyob huv lub nroog Alimathas txawm tuaj txug.
Nwg yog ib tug numtswv kws suavdlawg fwm, hab nwg yog ib tug kws tog ntsoov Vaajtswv lub Tebchaws yuav lug. Yauxej moog thov Philaj kuas muab Yexus lub cev rua nwg.
Thaus Philaj nov has tas Yexus tuag lawm, nwg xaav tsi thoob le. Nwg hu tug thawj tubrog lug nug saib Yexus tuag tau hov ntev lawm.
Thaus tug thawj tubrog qha rua Philaj taag lawm, Philaj pub Yauxej moog muab Yexus lub cev txu coj moog log.

Yauxej moog yuav ib chaws ntaub maag, nwg muab Yexus lub cev txu hab muab chaws ntaub maag qhwv hab kwv moog log rua huv ib lub qhov ntxaa kws luas txaug tau rua huv ib phaab pobzeb. Nwg dlov ib dlaim txag zeb luj lug npug lub rooj ntxaas ca.
Malis Madalas hab Malis kws yog Yauxej nam pum qhov chaw kws Yauxej coj Yexus lub cev moog log.
Thaus dlhau nub Xanpataus lawm, Malis Madalas, Malis kws yog Yakaunpaus nam, hab Xalaumes txawm moog yuav tshuaj tsw qaab coj moog pleev Yexus lub cev.
Nubkaaj thaus sawv ntxuv puab moog txug tom lub qhov ntxaa thaus nub taabtom tawm tuaj.
Thaus puab taug kev moog puab sis thaam has tas, “Leejtwg yuav paab muab dlaim txag zeb kws npug lub rooj ntxaas dlov tawm?” (Dlaim txag zeb ntawd luj kawg le.)
Thaus puab moog yuav txug, puab tsaa qhovmuag saib hab pum dlaim txag zeb tub muab dlov rua ib saab lawm.
Puab moog rua huv lub qhov ntxaa, hab puab pum ib tug tub hluas naav ib lub tsho dlawb ntev ntev nyob huv lub qhov ntxaa saab xis, puab ntshai kawg le.

Tug tub hluas ntawd has rua puab tas, “Mej tsi xob ntshai, kuv paub has tas mej tuaj nrhav Yexus kws yog tuabneeg Naxales kws luas muab ntsa rua sau ntoo khaublig. Nwg tsi nyob ntawm nuav, nwg tub sawv lawm! Mej saib ntawm nuav yog qhov chaw kws luas tso nwg lub cev ca.
Mej ca le rov qaab moog qha rua nwg cov thwjtim, hab has rua Petus has tas, ‘Nwg yuav ua mej ntej moog rua peg Kalilais, mej yuav ntsib nwg peg lawv le nwg tau qha rua mej lawm.’ ”
Cov quaspuj ntawm txawm tawm huv lub qhov ntxaa dlha rov qaab lug, ntshai ua ib ce tshee quas nyo. Puab tsi qha rua leejtwg le, rua qhov puab ntshai heev.

[Nub ib kws yog Nubkaaj thaus sawv ntxuv kws Yexus sawv huv qhov tuag rov qaab lug, Yexus xub lug tshwm rua Malis Madalas pum. Tug Malis nuav yog tug kws thaus raug xyaa tug dlaab hab Yexus ntab cov dlaab ntawd tawm lawm.
Nwg moog qha tej kws nwg pum rua Yexus cov phoojywg. Thaus ntawd puab taabtom nyuaj sab hab quaj ntsuag;
puab nov Malis has tas, Yexus rov muaj txujsa hab Malis tub pum Yexus lawm los puab tsi ntseeg Malis tej lug le.
Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus lug tshwm rua ob tug thwjtim pum, thaus obtug taabtom taug kev yuav moog peg yaajsaab, tabsis nwg lub cev hloov lawm.
Obtug rov qaab lug qha tej nuav rua cov thwjtim noog, tabsis puab tsi ntseeg obtug tej lug le.

Thaus kawg Yexus lug tshwm rua kaum ib tug thwjtim pum thaus puab taabtom noj mov. Yexus tshev cov thwjtim, rua qhov puab tsi ntseeg, puab muaj lub sab tawv, hab tsi ntseeg tej lug kws cov tuabneeg has tas, puab tub pum Yexus sawv rov muaj sa lawm.
Yexus has rua cov thwjtim has tas, “Mej ca le moog thoob plawg lub nplajteb nuav, hab qha Txujmoo Zoo kuas suavdlawg nov.
Tug kws ntseeg hab ua kevcai raus dlej yuav dlim; tabsis tug kws tsi ntseeg yuav raug txim.
Cov kws ntseeg yuav tau lub fwjchim ua tej txujci tseemceeb: puab yuav tuav kuv lub npe ntab tau dlaab tawm; puab yuav has tau tej lug txawv txawv.
Yog puab nteg naab los naab yuav tsi tum puab, yog puab haus tej tshuaj muaj taug los puab yuav tsi tuag; thaus puab cev teg tuav cov tuabneeg muaj mob, cov tuabneeg ntawd yuav zoo.”
Thaus Tswv Yexus qha puab taag, Vaajtswv txawm coj Yexus moog rua sau ntuj ceebtsheej lawm, hab nwg moog nyob ntawm Vaajtswv saab xis.

Cov thwjtim txawm moog qha thoob plawg txhua qhov, hab tug Tswv nrug puab ua num, nwg pub fwjchim rua puab ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb, suavdlawg txhaj paub has tas, tej lug kws puab qha yeej tseeb tag.] 9  [Cov quaspuj moog cuag Petus hab nwg cov phoojywg, hab qha txhua yaam kws Yexus has rua Petus puab.  10  Tom qaab ntawd, Yexus khaiv nwg cov thwjtim moog qha txujkev ncaaj nceeg hab txujkev cawm dlim kws nyob moog ibtxhis thoob plawg saab nubtuaj moog rua saab nubpoob].
